<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e6b9796e0425d604ccf4dd4df2733721/tumblr_inline_n5a7wdVMtV1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><object data="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf" height="378" id="clip_embed_player_flash" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="420"><param name="movie" value="http://www.twitch.tv/widgets/archive_embed_player.swf"><param name="allowScriptAccess" value="always"><param name="allowNetworking" value="all"><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"><param name="flashvars" value="title=Wingless%2Blanding%2Bw%252F4KbShort&channel=ksptv&auto_play=false&start_volume=25&chapter_id=4020726"></object></p>

<p>This week, we received the sad news that <strong>4kb Short</strong> will be leaving the <strong>KSP-TV</strong> team to focus on other endeavors. We wish him the best of luck! Let’s send him off with what might be a different type of sendoff for 6 Kerbals stuck in a shuttle that’s suffered a wing failure.</p>
I didn't get a chance to watch 4kb too much but I'm still sad to see him go

Noooooooooooo!

4kb was my favorite streamer! I'm REALLY sad to see him go, but then again, real life is a bit more important than the interwebs . See ya 4kbshort!
Well, that sucks. Anyone know whether or not he will come back?

4KB I'll miss you... <3.

I do stream myself but my cp doesn't have enough ram to stream without lag. Webcam, headset, OBS, the works. Just not the CP for a five star stream:P. I'll be getting more memory though (I only have 28.5 GB currently).

Edited May 9, 2014 by Avera9eJoe

4KB I'll miss you... <3.

I do stream myself but my cp doesn't have enough ram to stream without lag. Webcam, headset, OBS, the works. Just not the CP for a five star stream:P. I'll be getting more memory though (I only have 28.5 GB currently).

28.5 GB is a LOT!

Wait, how do you get 28.5??

Well, that sucks. Anyone know whether or not he will come back?

He'll still be making videos for his youtube channel and probably his own twitch channel. He'll also likely pop in on KSP-TV chat from time to time.
I'm sure there will be a return, ya just can't stay away from this game for too long.

Gah, thats too bad

Anyways... he will probably upload KSP-Footage on his Youtubes

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCkmigM2W0bMcZLBaLMXWf4A
